Articles.Content: Have you got the AmericanPack install also or at lease the BobCatind folder from it ?

Sorry should have posted more. If there is anymore you need please ask.

KSP: 0.90

JSI: 0.18.3 (With your patched .dll's)

Log http://puu.sh/e0rlB/e69c07a500.log

Based on the errors, it looks like the CHAKA / Orion command pod is configured incorrectly for RPM. The part config doesn't have the required RasterPropMonitorComputer module in it. You'll need to take that up with the mod authors.

Based on the errors, it looks like the CHAKA / Orion command pod is configured incorrectly for RPM. The part config doesn't have the required RasterPropMonitorComputer module in it. You'll need to take that up with the mod authors.

Would it be as easy as adding this to the pod config?

MODULE

{

name = RasterPropMonitorComputer

}

Edited January 3, 2015 by deepfield

Would it be as easy as adding this to the pod config?

That should do it.

That should do it.

Yup it worked. Although im not sure why but I had to add storedStrings in there also. Was throwing out errors without it

MODULE

{

name = RasterPropMonitorComputer

storedStrings = v 0.9.0|30.06.2014

}
